thread.title: Leicester, Everton and West Ham send scouts to watch Cafu | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Leicester, Everton and West Ham send scouts to watch Cafu | Daily Mail Online

author: Simon Jones For Mailonline
title: Leicester, Everton and West Ham send scouts to watch Cafu | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Leicester City, Everton and West Ham checked on Brazilian winger Jonathan Cafu in midweek. The Premier League trio sent scouts to watch 25-year-old Cafu play for Ludogorets in their Europa League defeat to Copenhagen. The Brazilian was given a lone striker role against the Danes but was unable to prevent his side going down 2-1. Jonathan Cafu looks to keep hold of the ball under pressure from two Copenhagen players Cafu was watched on Thursday night by scouts from Leicester, West Ham and Everton RELATED ARTICLES
